WorkItem.Description:
I'm trying to find a good example that creates a WCF Server GUI and WCF Client GUI where the client can change data on the server GUI or run the same functions that buttons on the server GUI uses.  I've been able to setup WCF server and client in console applications but I'm having trouble making the step from console applications to form/GUI applications.

Thanks,
Bubba
WorkItem.Summary: WCF GUI in C# that allows client to change form items.

Comments.Message:
Hi BubbaGee,

Thank you for using the Sample Request Service provided by Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework. We are investigating your requirement.

We have recently upgraded the sample request forum in order to better serve your requests.  Here is our announcement http://aka.ms/requestcodesamples.  Please consider reposting the sample request to the new forum, and we can continue working on this request there.  We appreciate your understanding. 

Thanks and have a great day!

--------------------
Microsoft All-In-One Code Framework 
Feedback address: onecode@microsoft.com
